pageContext.claim: “I saw some fake polls put out by the fake news media and had said that I'm tied, I'm tied with three of the other candidates, the Democrats. I'm tied in New Hampshire. I don't think so.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is not tied with Democrats in New Hampshire and the polls are not fake. Pollsters, not the media, have found that almost every major Democratic candidate would win the state against Trump in the 2020 general election.
